document.full_text: pakistan's prime minister defended his country's failure to spot that osama bin laden had been hiding out in a luxury compound near islamabad, saying that fighting terrorism was the whole world's responsibility.
document.title: pakistan pm defends failure to spot bin laden hideout
lines_and_colors: pakistan's prime minister defended his country's failure to spot that osama bin laden had been hiding out in a luxury compound near islamabad, saying that fighting terrorism was the whole world's responsibility.
